lines.i: Information about patient symptoms and complaints

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.9"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10755)/@code="67666-8" EMS situation Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10756)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Situation Section" (CONF:10758)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10757)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:11039)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Complaint (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.63)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11041)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Possible Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.64)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11043)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Provider Primary Impression (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.65)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11045)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Primary Symptom (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.66)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11047)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Symptoms (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.67)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11049)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Provider Secondary Impressions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.68)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11051)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Initial Patient Acuity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.69)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10755)/@code="67666-8" EMS situation Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10756)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Situation Section" (CONF:10758)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10757)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:11039)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Complaint (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.63)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11041)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Possible Injury (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.64)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11045)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Primary Symptom (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.66)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11047)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Symptoms (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.67)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11049)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Provider Secondary Impressions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.68)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11051)
